    • searchParams

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<model.TableItem> searchParams(String ID, String Name, String City, String State, String Highest, String Predominant, int Tuition, int RoomBoard, String minPopulation, String maxPopulation, String Major, String SATScore, String religion, String Ownership, int PellGrant, int Admission, String Region, String Locale)
      Get all Schools in Database that Match Given Parameters
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of School. Must be Exact. If Parameter is not 0 only One School Should be Returned. 0 will ignore the ID parameter
      Name - Name of School. Can be a Substring. I.e. Search for all Schools that have "SUNY" in Their Name. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank
      City - Name of City to Search For Schools in. Will Not Include if Left Blank
      State - State Abbreviation to Search For Schools in. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Highest - Highest Degree Offered at a School. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Predominant - The Predominant Degree Offered at a School. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Tuition - Average Cost of Tuition of a School. Will Also Include all Schools With a Lower Tuition. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank
      RoomBoard - Average Cost of Room and Board at a School. Will Also Include all Schools With a Lower Price. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank
      minPopulation - Minimum Number of People Enrolled at School. Will also Include all Schools with a Higher Population unless Max is Specified. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as 0
      maxPopulation - Maximum Number of People Enrolled at School. Will also Include all Schools with a Lower Population unless Min is Specified. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as 0
      Major - Intended Major at School. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      SATScore - Average SAT Score at School. Will also Include all Schools With A Lower Average SAT Score. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as 0
      religion - Religious Association of School. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Ownership - Level of Ownership of School. Will not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      PellGrant - Average Pell Grant Rate at a School. Will also Include Schools with a Higher Rate. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as 0
      Admission - Admission Rate of School. Will also Include all Schools with a Higher Rate. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as 0
      Region - Region a School Resides in. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Locale - Locale of School. Will Not Include in Search if Left Blank or as "--"
      Returns:
      Observable List of All Schools that Match Given Parameters
